name: Forsaken Survival
description:
Forsaken is in its very, very, very early Pre Alpha, expect bugs, errors, issues, unoptimized gameplay, don't think its a fully developed game. What is Forsaken? A base-building open world survival experience where you on take the place of a stranded test subject. Build, Craft. Keyboard Controls

WASD: Move

E: Build / Interact

Q: Build menu

1: Axe

2: Pickaxe

3: Hammer

RMB: Hammer Menu

Save Buildings: 8

Load Buildings: 9

P: Settings

Controller Controls

Right Stick: Move

Left Stick: Look

X / Square: Build / Interact

D-Pad UP: Axe

D-Pad Right: Pickaxe

D-Pad Down: Hammer

Y / Triangle: Hammer Menu

Menu Button: Settings
